summary:
Did you ever wonder how the Dragonborn (that\'s you!)  knows the name of every single flower, mushroom and moth in whole Skyrim (maybe even whole Tamriel?).

This mod takes care of that omniscience and requires YOU to know about Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Did you ever wonder how the Dragonborn (that\'s you!)  knows the name of every single flower, mushroom and moth in whole Skyrim (maybe even whole Tamriel?).

This mod takes care of that omniscience and requires YOU to know about Skyrim.

What this mod does:
It changes names like \"Luna Moth Wing\", \"Butterfly Wing\", \"Blue Dartwing\", \"Orange Dartwing\", \"Butterfly Wing\" to a simple  \"Wing\".
Similar changes for the different kinds of mushrooms, hides, claws, eggs, fishes...etc. 


NMM install:
download with manager and then just doubleclick it.

manual install: 
extract the archive and then just place the .esp into your skyrim/data folder.


Known issues:
none so far.
However i\'d feel better if you backed up your game. 
(the changes of this mod should (!) not harm your game in any way.)

Have fun and please tell me what you think about my mod! Feedback, suggestions and critizism is very welcome. I will try to check commets as often as possible


So the first optional file has finally arrived!
the changelog is unimpressive but it has to be written down somewhere, and i think that this is a good spot for it :)
\"Toe\" to \"Giant Toe\"
\"Claw\" to \"Bear Claw\"
Thats it.
I hope you guys enjoy your requested file. Happy gaming!


2013/04/30
updated main file, Elven Ear was named \"ear\", now changed to \"leaf\". Thanks a lot tfkillzone!


You might also be interested in my other mod:
Concealed Enemy Names
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22194
author: yaq
